statements: DELETE FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 101 AND interaction_type = 'like';
DELETE FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 100 AND interaction_description = 'Purchased Sword';
DELETE FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Chat' AND interaction_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 101 AND interaction_type = 'combat';
DELETE FROM player_movements WHERE player_id = 202 AND movement_type = 'run' AND movement_speed > 10.0;
DELETE FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE player_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'click';
DELETE FROM PlayerMovements WHERE movement_type = 'walking' AND location_x = 10.5;
DELETE FROM PlayerMovements WHERE location_x > 100 AND location_y < 50;
DELETE FROM EnvironmentObjects WHERE object_type = 'NPC' AND object_name LIKE '%Smith%';
